content: the pattern for these towels is easy enough for novice knitters but also lots of fun as you complete each row you ll see the diamond lattice form which is so satisfying the resulting towel is classic modern and stylish it will compliment whichever decor style you appreciate and liven up any kitchen these towels are also long enough to hang easily over your oven door you can use them to dry your hands dishes counter tops… whatever you see fit **materials ** size 7 4 5 mm straight knitting needles 210 yards just over 1 skein of knit picks dishie worsted weight yarn colours used in photos are swan and mint yarn needle to weave in ends scissors **finished size ** 13″ wide x 20″ long **skill level ** beginner
